data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stekolshchikov, Andrey V., Novgorodova, Tatiana A. (2010): A new species of Aspidophorodon Verma (Hemiptera, Aphididae) from the Altai Republic. Zootaxa 2566: 39-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197275
